mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BookWishList (wishCode, wishStatus, wishUserId, wishBookName, wishBookPublisher, wishBookAuthor, wishBookPublishDate, wishBookPrice, wishUserName, wishUserPhone) VALUES (#{wishCode}, #{wishStatus}, #{wishUserId}, #{wishBookName}, #{wishBookPublisher}, #{wishBookAuthor}, #{wishBookPublishDate}, #{wishBookPrice}, #{wishUserName}, #{wishUserPhone})
mapper.update: UPDATE BookWishList SET wishStatus = #{wishStatus}, wishUserId = #{wishUserId}, wishBookName = #{wishBookName}, wishBookPublisher = #{wishBookPublisher}, wishBookAuthor = #{wishBookAuthor}, wishBookPublishDate = #{wishBookPublishDate}, wishBookPrice = #{wishBookPrice}, wishUserName = #{wishUserName}, wishUserPhone = #{wishUserPhone} WHERE wishCode = #{wishCode}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BookWishList ORDER BY wishCode DESC
